name: Viral Solanki
text: Nice decent place. Never crowded here due to its location. Good place to hang out and talk in a peace environment. Great pizza obviously. A lady super friendly to cook possibly best pizza combination for you. Must go in the evening time.

name: Angie Pilato
text: Great pizza. They have vegan cheese. I love that they have an option for thicker crust. The team member that prepared our pizza was great and even changed his gloves without us asking him.  I gave them 4 stars instead of 5 because they don't offer any vegan meats.

name: Sameep Shah
text: I had a hand tossed veggie pizza and it was absolutely delicious.  Can't wait to go back again!! Staff was great.

name: Cherry Jefferson
text: Good pizza and Good Customer Focused Staff ! Thank you Mod Pizza Market Square - Sugar Land TX.

name: Sean Dixon
text: Friendly staff was very patient with getting my order correct despite my mask and I noticed a box of masks for customers at the counter. Food was fresh and delicious. It was very clear that they maintained a high standard of cleanliness as well. I will definitely return.

name: Sharon Hoyt
text:
Yummm! Fresh quick, made Your way.
Great value,  good social distancing observed too

name: Katy Stanley
text: The employee making our food adjusted his ear pod and then went back to making my food. Gross, man. Didn‚Äôt know ear wax was on the menu. The manager then burnt the pizza bc she walked to the back on her cell phone and then took it out of ‚Ä¶More

name: Gerald Brewer
text: Great value. Love the thin, crispy crush and any topping I want!

name: Zach Smith
text: Excellent pizza and the menu was nice, simple, and customizable. Would definitely be a returning customer if they had the chain in Indiana.

name: J D
text: Great pizza, great customer service. Clean restrooms.

name: Sandy Hawk
text: My first visit to Mod Pizza. I tried the cauliflower crust pizza and I loved it!  Staff was very pleasant and happy to assist in my selection.  I will definitely be back!

name: James O
text: Staff was great food was good for my first time I really enjoyed the experience though brief they made a great first impression. I was helped by a beautiful lady with a blue shirt whom was very pleasant while manning the front yesterday ‚Ä¶More

name: k bee
text: My new favorite pizza!

name: Andrew Green
text: Great place, great staff. I have been in here a few times and they are always great. Will come back again and will recommend to friends.

name: Draven Ramirez
text: Finally able to dine in, pizza is always good. Mad Dog pizza

name: Bhaumik Modi
text: Absolutely love the concept. The team at University Blvd is great. Spicy chicken is the best protein topping!

name: T Brooks
text: I loveeeee Mod! It allows me to eat great pizza and not feel guilty. It's soooo good! Nom nom nom!! ü§§üçï

name: julie melchor
text: Loved the pizza, recently my son became lactose intolerant and it was hard to find pizza that he could eat, this place has dairy free dough and cheese, it was made fresh and good...service was excellent, the staff was so nice and helpful. I‚Äôm gonna make this place my new pizza place.

name: shayaa bin
text: Went to Mod Pizza with my girlfriend and had a great time! We were shy about the experience and William showed us the ropes and made us feel really comfortable

name: Gale Ingram
text: Great pizza all the time.  I like that you can put any and every thing on your pizza without the extra charge.

name: Eric Neighbors
text: Great place to eat

name: William Peverill
text: Great staff

name: Eric Lund
text: I have been to several MOD Pizza locations, but this one just seemed a bit friendlier and the pizza seemed a bit tastier!

name: Brenda Colmenero
text: The manager was very rude I had to ask for someone else to help me she was so rude. After getting our food an employee came over and apologized for the managers behavior that's sad an employee has to apologize for a manager

name: Sara Zaidi
text: Yummy pizza!

name: Joseph Cavanaugh
text: Bad service and bad ownership. I tried to eat here but they would not serve me. Will not be back.

name: Saul Perez
text: Goof services

name: D C
text: The pizza are good , but the service can be spotty.

name: Melanie Edwards
text: Love this place.

name: Tonya Williams
text: Great place to eat

text: Delicious

text: Pizza was hot and fresh
